title: Capitalism, Socialism, and Democracy
content: A seminal work by **Joseph A. Schumpeter** that introduces the concept of 'creative destruction.' It's a deep dive into the dynamics of capitalism and its relationship with society.

title: In Search of Lost Time
content: Written by **Marcel Proust**, this is a monumental novel exploring memory, time, and identity. It's considered one of the most profound works of literature ever written.

title: Walden
content: By **Henry David Thoreau**, this book is a reflective account of simple living in natural surroundings. It's a classic text on self-reliance and the importance of connecting with nature.
